title: Netanyahu: Bribery allegations 'full of holes'
text:
Netanyahu: Bribery allegations 'full of holes' 12:02pm EST - 01:58 
Key coalition partners said on Wednesday that they would stick with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu for now, pending a decision by the attorney general whether or not to indict him for bribery as recommended by police. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Key coalition partners said on Wednesday that they would stick with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu for now, pending a decision by the attorney general whether or not to indict him for bribery as recommended by police.
